location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Abraham Hojel Nickson, Bombay to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Hojel's acceptance of the position of Residency surgeon and the lack of news or information regarding his commencing the position since then.The letter also mentions his wife Kitty's (Catherine Francis Hojel) journey home and the financial situation in Bombay.
